text: Camila Sodi (born Camila Ía González Sodi on 14 May 1986 in Mexico City, Mexico), is a Mexican singer, actress and model. She is the niece of actress and singer Thalía. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Role 2007 El búfalo de la noche Rebeca 2007 Niñas mal Pía 2007 Déficit Elisa 2008 Arráncame la vida Lilia Ascencio 2014 Amor de mis amores Andrea === Television === Year Title Role 2004–2005 Inocente de ti Flor de Maria "Florecita" González de Linares-Robles 2015 Señorita Pólvora Valentina Cárdenas "Señorita Pólvora" 2015–2016 A que no me dejas Paulina Murat/ Valentina Murat == References == == Other websites == * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican models Category:Singers from Mexico City
title: Camila Sodi
